title: Bug 32286 - ControlExample Button Tab: Changing styles resets button orientation
description: Bug 32286 - ControlExample Button Tab: Changing styles resets button orientation. Ensure that Eclipse is not running. Accept new configuration defaults. The buttons will change to arrow buttons, pointing up.
OB: When styles are changed, the button orientation resets unexpectedly.
EB: Select or deselect SWT.BORDER in the styles group should not reset the button orientation.
SR:
1. Launch Eclipse and open ControlExample.
2. Accept the new configuration defaults.
3. Navigate to the styles group.
4. Select or deselect SWT.BORDER.
5. Observe that the button orientation remains unchanged.
